org.deeplearning4j.nn.layers.recurrent

Class LSTM

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.deeplearning4j.nn.layers.BaseLayer
      • org.deeplearning4j.nn.layers.recurrent.LSTM
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, Layer, Model

    public class LSTM
extends BaseLayer
    LSTM recurrent net. Based on karpathy et. al's work on generation of image descriptions.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
